title: the Boston Strangler
brief_description: Boston is being terrorized by a series of seemingly random murders of women. Based on the true story, the film follows the investigators path through several leads before introducing the Strangler as a character. It is seen almost exclusively from the point of view of the investigators who have very few clues to build a case upon.

constellations_other.name: Lois Weber and the split-screen
constellations_other.description: Lois Weber was the third filmmaker to use split screens to show simultaneous action, helping establish it as part of cinematic language, particularly its use in thrillers. It's since been taken to extremes by auteurs and videogames.
